name: codemap
description: Semantic code intelligence - build knowledge graphs of codebases for AI-assisted exploration
long_description:
Code Map uses tree-sitter to parse source code and build a knowledge graph of symbols and their relationships. It provides MCP tools for searching symbols, finding callers/callees, analyzing change impact, and building focused context for AI tasks.

Supported languages: Rust, TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Go, Java, C, C++

tools.name: codemap-context
tools.description: Build focused code context for a specific task. Returns entry points, related symbols, and code snippets.

tools.name: codemap-search
tools.description: Quick symbol search by name. Returns locations only (no code).

tools.name: codemap-callers
tools.description: Find all functions/methods that call a specific symbol.

tools.name: codemap-callees
tools.description: Find all functions/methods that a specific symbol calls.

tools.name: codemap-impact
tools.description: Analyze the impact radius of changing a symbol.

tools.name: codemap-node
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific code symbol.

tools.name: codemap-status
tools.description: Get the status of the codemap index. Shows statistics about indexed files, symbols, and relationships.

user_config.name: Project Root
user_config.description: Path to the project directory to index
